html:
Alternative forms[edit]

  • dispertiō

Etymology[edit]

From dis- +‎ partīo.

Pronunciation[edit]

  • (Classical) IPA(key): /disˈpar.ti.oː/, [d̪ɪsˈpar.t̪i.oː]
  • (Ecclesiastical) IPA(key): /disˈpar.t͡si.o/, [d̪isˈpar.t͡si.ɔ]

Verb[edit]

dispartiō (present infinitive dispartīre, perfect active dispartīvī or dispartiī, supine dispartītum); fourth conjugation

  1. I divide (up).
  2. I distribute.
  3. I assign.

Descendants[edit]

  • Aromanian: dispartu, dispãrtsãri
  • English: dispart, disperse
  • Friulian: dispartî
  • Italian: dispartire
  • Portuguese: dispartir
  • Romanian: despărți, despărțire
  • Spanish: despartir
